author: Special Correspondent
title: Complaint against Minister
description: Congress leaders have complained against Women and Child Welfare Minister Shashikala Jolle for violating lockdown protocols in Nippani town on Sunday. The Minister violated provisions of Section 144 o
content:
Congress leaders have complained against Women and Child Welfare Minister Shashikala Jolle for violating lockdown protocols in Nippani town on Sunday. 
The Minister violated provisions of Section 144 of Cr.PC and COVID-19 lockdown protocol by organising an e… [+810 chars]
